content.question: In which of the following ways did the Reagan administration implement the “anticommunist ideology” described in the excerpt?

choices.label: Conducting a buildup of nuclear and conventional weapons
Engaging in wars against Vietnam and other communist regimes
Launching military interventions in Eastern Europe and Africa
Advocating a war on terrorism against Iraq

content.answer: Conducting a buildup of nuclear and conventional weapons

topic.text: 9.3: The End of the Cold War

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
